scrollItems.heading: Diwali 2018
scrollItems.details: This year diwali is worth to remember as we are celebrating with them after 2 years.

scrollItems.heading: 2016 Event
scrollItems.details: After giving study material to needy students we tried to bring smile on the old people or we can say sweet people.

scrollItems.heading: Education is need
scrollItems.details: Distributed school related thing to students of different school in Shriwardhan and Mhasala taluka, who are not capable to buy the same

scrollItems.heading: Adivasi
scrollItems.details: We started with this event as an unique idea to celebrate diwali with Aadivasi people by giving them 'faral'.
